author: newsr.in
title: VIDEO: See why MS Dhoni, Virat Kohli, Ravi Shastri are cheering for South Africa!
text: A day after Team India suffered a 7-wicket loss against Faf du Plessis -led South Africa in the ongoing T20 series, Indian skipper MS Dhoni, his deputy Virat Kohli and Team Director Ravi Shastri were seen cheering for South African rugby team. Â»
